project_descr: Protection of health&environment by elimination of current Persistent Organic Pollutants (POPs) legacies,ensure long-term capacity to manage POPs with int'l practice&standards & integrate POPs activities in national sound chemical management initiatives.

outputs.output_descr: Human health&environment will be protected through elimination of POPs Pesticide&PCB stockpiles, initiating clean-up of POPs contaminated sites, reducing POPs release in major industrial sectors.
